summary: On Moomin Discourse
body:
On Moomin Discourse

Snufkin does bathe, however, he does not wash his clothing.

Thus he remains stinky and clean.

Thank you.

summary: I don’t know about you but I love the idea of Joxter being some kind of forest deity and Snufkin having certain abilities too as...
body:
I don’t know about you but I love the idea of Joxter being some kind of forest deity and Snufkin having certain abilities too as a result.

The rare times Joxter does get angry, it suddenly gets cold and the sky is turning a bleak gray and you can barely see the sun. Joxter just glares with glowing blue eyes while nature around him stills.

For Snufkin, it becomes unbearably hot and the plants and flowers around him are suddenly withering as the animals stop to stare at you. They’re still, as if waiting for orders to attack.

Either way, it’s best to stay on their good side.

summary: Do the kids have a favorite aunt? (Or any friends like maybe someone else’s kid(?))
question: Do the kids have a favorite aunt? (Or any friends like maybe someone else’s kid(?))
answer:
Well, what we can say , Spring likes more Auntie Little My but sometimes Mymble due liking family personality.

Spring is also absent too, but he likes more to spend time with Joxter and Moominpappa grandpas.

Moominumrik is more complicated because he is apparently traveler and even though can be sweet friendly, he doesn’t hold friendship too much.

Moominumrik likes a bit auntie Mymble (My’s sister) because she’s nice and calm, joyful and since Moominumrik does have lot of friends during travel , he likes ‘Uncle’ Snork more.

It would be nice to have them friends with other kids, if you have ideas , shoot at me))
